input_text.Prompt:
Given a product title and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product title:
Outside Window Thermometer Right or Left Mount - Electric Blue Anodized Aluminum

Product specifications:
Anodized Aluminum
Right or Left Window Frame Mount
Rotate up to 90 for Easy Viewing
Temperature Range: -30F to 120F
Dimensions: 7.5 x 2.75 x 1 in. (19 x 7 x 2.5 cm)

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This electric blue anodized aluminum outside window thermometer is a great tool to have in your home. It is easy to install and has a range of temperature from -30F to 120F. The thermometer can be mounted on either the right or left window frame, making it versatile and space-saving. The product has a weatherproof case and a rotating design for easy viewing. Overall, this product is a useful and reliable tool that can help you keep track of the temperature outside your home.
input_text.Response B: This bright blue thermometer can be mounted on the right or left side of your window. You can rotate it up to 90 degrees for easy viewing from inside your home. It's great for knowing the temperature outside when it's very hot or very cold. It works from -30 degrees Fahrenheit all the way up to 120 degrees Fahrenheit.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
